001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.activations;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
004
005/**
006 * Implements the Rectified Linear Unit (ReLU).
007 */
008@Strategy(role = Strategy.Role.CONCRETE)
009public class ReLU implements ActivationFunction {
010
011    /**
012     * Returns the logit if positive, otherwise 0.
013     *
014     * @param logit the logit to map
015     * @return the output
016     */
017    @Override
018    public float activate(float logit) {
019        return Math.max(0, logit);
020    }
021
022    /**
023     * {@inheritDoc}
024     */
025    public float determineGradientForOutput(float output) {
026        return output > 0.0f ? 1.0f : 0.0f;
027    }
028}
